xmp_property.name: ExifVersion
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/ExifVersion_description=EXIF tag 36864, 0x9000. EXIF version number.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/ExifVersion_label=EXIF Version

xmp_property.name: FlashpixVersion
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/FlashpixVersion_description=EXIF tag 40960, 0xA000. Version of FlashPix.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/FlashpixVersion_label=Flashpix Version

xmp_property.name: ColorSpace
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/ColorSpace_description=EXIF tag 40961, 0xA001. Color space information.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/ColorSpace_label=Color Space

xmp_property.name: ComponentsConfiguration
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/ComponentsConfiguration_description=EXIF tag 37121, 0x9101. Configuration of components in data.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/ComponentsConfiguration_label=Components Configuration

xmp_property.name: CompressedBitsPerPixel
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/CompressedBitsPerPixel_description=EXIF tag 37122, 0x9102. Compression mode used for a compressed image is indicated in unit bits per pixel.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/CompressedBitsPerPixel_label=Compressed Bits Per Pixel

xmp_property.name: PixelXDimension
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/PixelXDimension_description=EXIF tag 40962, 0xA002. Valid image width, in pixels.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/PixelXDimension_label=Pixel X Dimension

xmp_property.name: PixelYDimension
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/PixelYDimension_description=EXIF tag 40963, 0xA003. Valid image height, in pixels.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/PixelYDimension_label=Pixel Y Dimension

xmp_property.name: UserComment
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/UserComment_description=EXIF tag 37510, 0x9286. Comments from user.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/UserComment_label=User Comment

xmp_property.name: RelatedSoundFile
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/RelatedSoundFile_description=EXIF tag 40964, 0xA004. An "8.3" file name for the related sound file.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/RelatedSoundFile_label=Related Sound File

xmp_property.name: DateTimeOriginal
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/DateTimeOriginal_description=EXIF tags 36867, 0x9003 (primary) and 37521, 0x9291 (subseconds). Date and time when original image was generated, in ISO 8601 format. Includes the EXIF SubSecTimeOriginal data.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/DateTimeOriginal_label=Date Time Original

xmp_property.name: DateTimeDigitized
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/DateTimeDigitized_description=EXIF tag 36868, 0x9004 (primary) and 37522, 0x9292 (subseconds). Date and time when image was stored as digital data, can be the same as DateTimeOriginal if originally stored in digital form. Stored in ISO 8601 format. Includes the EXIF SubSecTimeDigitized data.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/DateTimeDigitized_label=Date Time Digitized

xmp_property.name: ExposureTime
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/ExposureTime_description=EXIF tag 33434, 0x829A. Exposure time in seconds.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/ExposureTime_label=Exposure Time

xmp_property.name: FNumber
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/FNumber_description=EXIF tag 33437, 0x829D. F number.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/FNumber_label=F-Stop

xmp_property.name: ExposureProgram
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/ExposureProgram_description=EXIF tag 34850, 0x8822. Class of program used for exposure.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/ExposureProgram_label=Exposure Program

xmp_choice.label: $$$/xmp/exif/ExposureProgram/5=Creative program biased toward depth of field)
$$$/xmp/exif/ExposureProgram/7=Portrait mode (for closeup photos with the background out of focus)
$$$/xmp/exif/ExposureProgram/8=Landscape mode (for landscape photos with the background in focus)

xmp_property.name: SpectralSensitivity
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/SpectralSensitivity_description=EXIF tag 34852, 0x8824. Spectral sensitivity of each channel.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/SpectralSensitivity_label=Spectral Sensitivity

xmp_property.name: ISOSpeedRatings
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/ISOSpeedRatings_description=EXIF tag 34855, 0x8827. ISO Speed and ISO Latitude of the input device as specified in ISO 12232.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/ISOSpeedRatings_label=ISO Speed Ratings

xmp_property.name: OECF
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/OECF_description=EXIF tag 34856, 0x8828. Opto-Electoric Conversion Function as specified in ISO 14524.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/OECF_label=OECF

xmp_property.name: ShutterSpeedValue
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/ShutterSpeedValue_description=EXIF tag 37377, 0x9201. Shutter speed, unit is APEX. See Annex C of the EXIF specification.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/ShutterSpeedValue_label=Shutter Speed Value

xmp_property.name: ApertureValue
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/ApertureValue_description=EXIF tag 37378, 0x9202. Lens aperture, unit is APEX.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/ApertureValue_label=Aperture Value

xmp_property.name: BrightnessValue
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/BrightnessValue_description=EXIF tag 37379, 0x9203. Brightness, unit is APEX.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/BrightnessValue_label=Brightness Value

xmp_property.name: ExposureBiasValue
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/ExposureBiasValue_description=EXIF tag 37380, 0x9204. Exposure bias, unit is APEX.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/ExposureBiasValue_label=Exposure Bias Value

xmp_property.name: MaxApertureValue
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/MaxApertureValue_description=EXIF tag 37381, 0x9205. Smallest F number of lens, in APEX.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/MaxApertureValue_label=Max Aperture Value

xmp_property.name: SubjectDistance
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/SubjectDistance_description=EXIF tag 37382, 0x9206. Distance to subject, in meters.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/SubjectDistance_label=Subject Distance

xmp_property.name: MeteringMode
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/MeteringMode_description=EXIF tag 37383, 0x9207. Metering mode.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/MeteringMode_label=Metering Mode

xmp_property.name: LightSource
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/LightSource_description=EXIF tag 37384, 0x9208. EXIF tag , 0x. Light source.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/LightSource_label=Light Source

xmp_property.name: Flash
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/Flash_description=Flash usage data
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/Flash_label=Flash

xmp_property.name: FocalLength
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/FocalLength_description=EXIF tag 37386, 0x920A. Focal length of the lens, in millimeters.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/FocalLength_label=Focal Length

xmp_property.name: SubjectArea
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/SubjectArea_description=EXIF tag 37396, 0x9214. The location and area of the main subject in the overall scene.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/SubjectArea_label=Subject Area

xmp_property.name: FlashEnergy
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/FlashEnergy_description=EXIF tag 41483, 0xA20B. Strobe energy during image capture.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/FlashEnergy_label=Flash Energy

xmp_property.name: SpatialFrequencyResponse
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/SpatialFrequencyResponse_description=EXIF tag 41484, 0xA20C. Input device spatial frequency table and SFR values as specified in ISO 12233.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/SpatialFrequencyResponse_label=Spatial Frequency Response

xmp_property.name: FocalPlaneXResolution
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/FocalPlaneXResolution_description=EXIF tag 41486, 0xA20E. Horizontal focal resolution, measured pixels per unit.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/FocalPlaneXResolution_label=Focal Plane X Resolution

xmp_property.name: FocalPlaneYResolution
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/FocalPlaneYResolution_description=EXIF tag 41487, 0xA20F. Vertical focal resolution, measured in pixels per unit.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/FocalPlaneYResolution_label=Focal Plane Y Resolution

xmp_property.name: FocalPlaneResolutionUnit
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/FocalPlaneResolutionUnit_description=EXIF tag 41488, 0xA210. Unit used for FocalPlaneXResolution and FocalPlaneYResolution. 2 = inches 3 = centimeters
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/FocalPlaneResolutionUnit_label=Focal Plane Resolution Unit

xmp_property.name: SubjectLocation
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/SubjectLocation_description=EXIF tag 41492, 0xA214. Location of the main subject of the scene. The first value is the horizontal pixel and the second value is the vertical pixel at which the main subject appears.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/SubjectLocation_label=Subject Location

xmp_property.name: ExposureIndex
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/ExposureIndex_description=EXIF tag 41493, 0xA215. Exposure index of input device.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/ExposureIndex_label=Exposure Index

xmp_property.name: SensingMethod
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/SensingMethod_description=EXIF tag 41495, 0xA217. Image sensor type on input device.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/SensingMethod_label=Sensing Method

xmp_property.name: FileSource
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/FileSource_description=EXIF tag 41728, 0xA300. Indicates image source.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/FileSource_label=File Source

xmp_property.name: SceneType
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/SceneType_description=EXIF tag 41729, 0xA301. Indicates the type of scene.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/SceneType_label=Scene Type

xmp_choice.label: $$$/xmp/exif/SceneType/0=1 (directly photographed image) is the only choice.

xmp_property.name: CFAPattern
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/CFAPattern_description=EXIF tag 41730, 0xA302. Color filter array geometric pattern of the image sense.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/CFAPattern_label=CFA Pattern

xmp_property.name: CustomRendered
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/CustomRendered_description=EXIF tag 41985, 0xA401. Indicates the use of special processing on image data.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/CustomRendered_label=Custom Rendered

xmp_property.name: ExposureMode
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/ExposureMode_description=EXIF tag 41986, 0xA402. Indicates the exposure mode set when the image was shot.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/ExposureMode_label=Exposure Mode

xmp_property.name: WhiteBalance
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/WhiteBalance_description=EXIF tag 41987, 0xA403. Indicates the white balance mode set when the image was shot.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/WhiteBalance_label=White Balance

xmp_property.name: DigitalZoomRatio
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/DigitalZoomRatio_description=EXIF tag 41988, 0xA404. Indicates the digital zoom ratio when the image was shot.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/DigitalZoomRatio_label=Digital Zoom Ratio

xmp_property.name: FocalLengthIn35mmFilm
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/FocalLengthIn35mmFilm_description=EXIF tag 41989, 0xA405. Indicates the equivalent focal length assuming a 35mm film camera, in mm. A value of 0 means the focal length is unknown. Note that this tag differs from the FocalLength tag.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/FocalLengthIn35mmFilm_label=Focal Length In 35mm Film

xmp_property.name: SceneCaptureType
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/SceneCaptureType_description=EXIF tag 41990, 0xA406. Indicates the type of scene that was shot.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/SceneCaptureType_label=Scene Capture Type

xmp_property.name: GainControl
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/GainControl_description=EXIF tag 41991, 0xA407. Indicates the degree of overall image gain adjustment.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/GainControl_label=Gain Control

xmp_property.name: Contrast
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/Contrast_description=EXIF tag 41992, 0xA408. Indicates the direction of contrast processing applied by the camera.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/Contrast_label=Contrast

xmp_property.name: Saturation
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/Saturation_description=EXIF tag 41993, 0xA409. Indicates the direction of saturation processing applied by the camera.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/Saturation_label=Saturation

xmp_property.name: Sharpness
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/Sharpness_description=EXIF tag 41994, 0xA40A. Indicates the direction of sharpness processing applied by the camera.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/Sharpness_label=Sharpness

xmp_property.name: DeviceSettingDescription
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/DeviceSettingDescription_description=EXIF tag 41995, 0xA40B. Indicates information on the picture-taking conditions of a particular camera model.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/DeviceSettingDescription_label=Device Setting Description

xmp_property.name: SubjectDistanceRange
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/SubjectDistanceRange_description=EXIF tag 41996, 0xA40C. Indicates the distance to the subject.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/SubjectDistanceRange_label=Subject Distance Range

xmp_property.name: ImageUniqueID
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/ImageUniqueID_description=EXIF tag 42016, 0xA420. An identifier assigned uniquely to each image. It is recorded as a 32 character ASCII string, equivalent to hexadecimal notation and 128-bit fixed length.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/ImageUniqueID_label=Image Unique ID

xmp_property.name: GPSVersionID
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/GPSVersionID_description=Version number of the GPS metadata recorded
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/GPSVersionID_label=GPS Version ID

xmp_property.name: GPSLatitude
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/GPSLatitude_description=Indicates latitude.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/GPSLatitude_label=GPS Latitude

xmp_property.name: GPSLongitude
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/GPSLongitude_description=Indicates longitude.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/GPSLongitude_label=GPS Longitude

xmp_property.name: GPSAltitudeRef
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/GPSAltitudeRef_description=Indicates whether the altitude is above or below sea level.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/GPSAltitudeRef_label=GPS Altitude Ref

xmp_property.name: GPSAltitude
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/GPSAltitude_description=Indicates altitude in meters.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/GPSAltitude_label=GPS Altitude

xmp_property.name: GPSTimeStamp
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/GPSTimeStamp_description=Time recorded by the GPS receiver in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC)
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/GPSTimeStamp_label=GPS Time Stamp

xmp_property.name: GPSSatellites
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/GPSSatellites_description=Satellite information, format is unspecified.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/GPSSatellites_label=GPS Satellites

xmp_property.name: GPSStatus
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/GPSStatus_description=Status of GPS receiver at image creation time.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/GPSStatus_label=GPS Status

xmp_property.name: GPSMeasureMode
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/GPSMeasureMode_description=GPS measurement mode, Text type: 2 = two-dimensional measurement 3 = three-dimensional measurement.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/GPSMeasureMode_label=GPS Measure Mode

xmp_property.name: GPSDOP
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/GPSDOP_description=Degree of precision for GPS data.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/GPSDOP_label=GPS Degree of Precision

xmp_property.name: GPSSpeedRef
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/GPSSpeedRef_description=Units used to speed measurement.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/GPSSpeedRef_label=GPS Speed Ref

xmp_property.name: GPSSpeed
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/GPSSpeed_description=Speed of GPS receiver movement.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/GPSSpeed_label=GPS Speed

xmp_property.name: GPSTrackRef
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/GPSTrackRef_description=Reference for movement direction.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/GPSTrackRef_label=GPS Track Ref

xmp_property.name: GPSTrack
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/GPSTrack_description=Direction of GPS movement, values range from 0 to 359.99.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/GPSTrack_label=GPS Track

xmp_property.name: GPSImgDirectionRef
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/GPSImgDirectionRef_description=Reference for movement direction.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/GPSImgDirectionRef_label=GPS Img Direction Ref

xmp_property.name: GPSImgDirection
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/GPSImgDirection_description=Direction of image when captured, values range from 0 to 359.99.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/GPSImgDirection_label=GPS Img Direction

xmp_property.name: GPSMapDatum
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/GPSMapDatum_description=Geodetic survey data.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/GPSMapDatum_label=GPS Map Datum

xmp_property.name: GPSDestLatitude
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/GPSDestLatitude_description=Indicates destination latitude.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/GPSDestLatitude_label=GPS Dest Latitude

xmp_property.name: GPSDestLongitude
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/GPSDestLongitude_description=Indicates destination longitude.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/GPSDestLongitude_label=GPS Dest Longitude

xmp_property.name: GPSDestBearingRef
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/GPSDestBearingRef_description=Reference for movement direction.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/GPSDestBearingRef_label=GPS Dest Bearing Ref

xmp_property.name: GPSDestBearing
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/GPSDestBearing_description=Destination bearing, values from 0 to 359.99.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/GPSDestBearing_label=GPS Dest Bearing

xmp_property.name: GPSDestDistanceRef
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/GPSDestDistanceRef_description=Units used for speed measurement.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/GPSDestDistanceRef_label=GPS Dest Distance Ref

xmp_property.name: GPSDestDistance
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/GPSDestDistance_description=Distance to destination.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/GPSDestDistance_label=GPS Dest Distance

xmp_property.name: GPSProcessingMethod
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/GPSProcessingMethod_description=A character string recording the name of the method used for location finding.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/GPSProcessingMethod_label=GPS Processing Method

xmp_property.name: GPSAreaInformation
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/GPSAreaInformation_description=A character string recording the name of the GPS area.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/GPSAreaInformation_label=GPS Area Information

xmp_property.name: GPSDifferential
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/GPSDifferential_description=Indicates whether differential correction is applied to the GPS receiver.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/GPSDifferential_label=GPS Differential

xmp_property.name: GPSHPositioningError
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/exif/GPSHPositioningError_description=Indicates the GPS horizontal positioning errors in meters
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/exif/GPSHPositioningError_label=GPS Horizontal Positioning Error

xmp_field.name: Return
xmp_field.description: $$$/xmp/exif/flash/Return_description=Whether strobe return is supported and if supported, detected.
xmp_field.label: $$$/xmp/exif/flash/Return_label=Return

xmp_field.name: Function
xmp_field.description: $$$/xmp/exif/flash/Function_description=True if flash function is not present.
xmp_field.label: $$$/xmp/exif/flash/Function_label=Function

xmp_field.name: Values
xmp_field.description: $$$/xmp/exif/oecf/sfr/Values_description=OECF/SFR values, sequence should be in order: value 0,0 ... value n - 1, 0 value 0, m - 1 ... value n - 1, m - 1.
xmp_field.label: $$$/xmp/exif/oecf/sfr/Values_label=Values

xmp_field.name: Values
xmp_field.description: $$$/xmp/exif/cfapattern/Values_description=CFA values, sequence should be in order: value 0,0 ... value n - 1, 0 value 0, m - 1 ... value n - 1, m - 1.
xmp_field.label: $$$/xmp/exif/cfapattern/Values_label=Values
